trans-unit.source: Create an Orchard CMS web app from the Azure Marketplace
trans-unit.target: Create an Orchard CMS web app from the Azure Marketplace

trans-unit.source: A tutorial that teaches you how to create a new web app in Azure. Also learn how to launch and manage your web app using the Azure Portal.
trans-unit.target: A tutorial that teaches you how to create a new web app in Azure. Also learn how to launch and manage your web app using the Azure Portal.

trans-unit.source: Create an Orchard CMS web app from the Azure Marketplace
trans-unit.target: Create an Orchard CMS web app from the Azure Marketplace

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: The Marketplace makes available a wide range of popular web applications developed by Microsoft, third party companies, and open source software initiatives.
trans-unit.target: The Marketplace makes available a wide range of popular web applications developed by Microsoft, third party companies, and open source software initiatives.

trans-unit.source: Web applications created from the Marketplace do not require installation of any software other than the browser used to connect to the <link><linkText>Azure preview portal</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Web applications created from the Marketplace do not require installation of any software other than the browser used to connect to the <link><linkText>Azure preview portal</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the web applications in the Marketplace, see <link><linkText>Azure Marketplace</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about the web applications in the Marketplace, see <link><linkText>Azure Marketplace</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: In this tutorial, you'll learn:
trans-unit.target: In this tutorial, you'll learn:

trans-unit.source: How to create a new web app from the Marketplace
trans-unit.target: How to create a new web app from the Marketplace

trans-unit.source: How to launch and manage your web app from the Azure Portal
trans-unit.target: How to launch and manage your web app from the Azure Portal

trans-unit.source: You'll build an Orchard CMS web app that uses a default template.
trans-unit.target: You'll build an Orchard CMS web app that uses a default template.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Orchard</linkText><title></title></link> is a free, open-source, .NET-based CMS application that allows you to create customized, content-driven web apps and websites.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Orchard</linkText><title></title></link> is a free, open-source, .NET-based CMS application that allows you to create customized, content-driven web apps and websites.

trans-unit.source: Orchard CMS includes an extensibility framework through which you can <link><linkText>download additional modules and themes</linkText><title></title></link> to customize your web app.
trans-unit.target: Orchard CMS includes an extensibility framework through which you can <link><linkText>download additional modules and themes</linkText><title></title></link> to customize your web app.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows the Orchard CMS web app in <link><linkText>Azure App Service</linkText><title></title></link> that you will create.
trans-unit.target: The following illustration shows the Orchard CMS web app in <link><linkText>Azure App Service</linkText><title></title></link> that you will create.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Orchard blog</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Orchard blog</linkText>

trans-unit.source: If you want to get started with Azure App Service before signing up for an Azure account, go to <link><linkText>Try App Service</linkText><title></title></link>, where you can immediately create a short-lived starter web app in App Service.
trans-unit.target: If you want to get started with Azure App Service before signing up for an Azure account, go to <link><linkText>Try App Service</linkText><title></title></link>, where you can immediately create a short-lived starter web app in App Service.

trans-unit.source: No credit cards required; no commitments.
trans-unit.target: No credit cards required; no commitments.

trans-unit.source: Create an Orchard web app from the Marketplace
trans-unit.target: Create an Orchard web app from the Marketplace

trans-unit.source: Login to the <link><linkText>Azure preview portal</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Login to the <link><linkText>Azure preview portal</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Click New > Web + Mobile > Azure Marketplace.
trans-unit.target: Click New > Web + Mobile > Azure Marketplace.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Create New</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Create New</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click Web Apps > Orchard CMS.
trans-unit.target: Click Web Apps > Orchard CMS.

trans-unit.source: In the next blade, click Create.
trans-unit.target: In the next blade, click Create.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Create From Marketplace</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Create From Marketplace</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Configure the web app's URL, App Service plan, resource group, and location.
trans-unit.target: Configure the web app's URL, App Service plan, resource group, and location.

trans-unit.source: When you're done, click Create.
trans-unit.target: When you're done, click Create.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure the app</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure the app</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Once your web app is created, the Notifications button will show a green "SUCCESS" and your web app's blade will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Once your web app is created, the Notifications button will show a green "SUCCESS" and your web app's blade will be displayed.

trans-unit.source: Launch and manage your Orchard web app
trans-unit.target: Launch and manage your Orchard web app

trans-unit.source: In your web app's blade, click Browse to open your web app's welcome page.
trans-unit.target: In your web app's blade, click Browse to open your web app's welcome page.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>browse button</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>browse button</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Enter the configuration information required by Orchard, and then click Finish Setup to complete the configuration and open the web app's home page.
trans-unit.target: Enter the configuration information required by Orchard, and then click Finish Setup to complete the configuration and open the web app's home page.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>login to Orchard</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>login to Orchard</linkText>

trans-unit.source: You'll have a new Orchard web app that looks similar to the screenshot below.
trans-unit.target: You'll have a new Orchard web app that looks similar to the screenshot below.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>your Orchard web app</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>your Orchard web app</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Follow the details in the <link><linkText>Orchard Documentation</linkText><title></title></link> to learn more about Orchard and configure your new web app.
trans-unit.target: Follow the details in the <link><linkText>Orchard Documentation</linkText><title></title></link> to learn more about Orchard and configure your new web app.

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Create an ASP.NET MVC app with auth and SQL DB and deploy to Azure App Service</linkText><title></title></link>-- Learn how to create a new web app in Azure App Service from Visual Studio.

trans-unit.source: What's changed
trans-unit.target: What's changed

trans-unit.source: For a guide to the change from Websites to App Service see: <link><linkText>Azure App Service and Its Impact on Existing Azure Services</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: For a guide to the change from Websites to App Service see: <link><linkText>Azure App Service and Its Impact on Existing Azure Services</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: For a guide to the change of the portal to the preview portal see: <link><linkText>Reference for navigating the preview portal</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: For a guide to the change of the portal to the preview portal see: <link><linkText>Reference for navigating the preview portal</linkText><title></title></link>
